mapper.select: SELECT REC.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, ACR.name AS extra__actingRoleName, ACR.gender AS extra__actingRoleGender, ACR.age AS extra__actingRoleAge, ACR.job AS extra__actingRoleJob, ACR.scriptStatus AS extra__actingScriptStatus, ACR.scenesCount AS extra__actingRoleScenesCount, ACR.shootingsCount AS extra__actingRoleShootingsCount, ACR.pay AS extra__actingRolePay, ARW.name AS extra__artworkName, ARW.directorName AS extra__directorName, ARW.productionName AS extra__productionName FROM recruitment AS REC INNER JOIN member AS M ON REC.memberId = M.id INNER JOIN actingRole AS ACR ON REC.roleTypeCode = 'actingRole' AND REC.roleId = ACR.id INNER JOIN artwork AS ARW ON ACR.artworkId = ARW.id WHERE REC.displayStatus = 1 ORDER BY REC.id DESC

SELECT REC.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, ACR.name AS extra__actingRoleName, ACR.gender AS extra__actingRoleGender, ACR.age AS extra__actingRoleAge, ACR.job AS extra__actingRoleJob, ACR.scriptStatus AS extra__actingScriptStatus, ACR.scenesCount AS extra__actingRoleScenesCount, ACR.shootingsCount AS extra__actingRoleShootingsCount, ACR.pay AS extra__actingRolePay, ARW.name AS extra__artworkName, ARW.directorName AS extra__directorName, ARW.productionName AS extra__productionName FROM recruitment AS REC INNER JOIN member AS M ON REC.memberId = M.id INNER JOIN actingRole AS ACR ON REC.roleTypeCode = 'actingRole' AND REC.roleId = ACR.id INNER JOIN artwork AS ARW ON ACR.artworkId = ARW.id WHERE REC.displayStatus = 1 AND REC.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruitment SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, roleTypeCode = #{roleTypeCode}, roleId = #{roleId}, memberId = #{memberId}, jobId = #{jobId}, displayStatus = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE recruitment SET delStatus = 1, delDate = NOW(), displayStatus = 0 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE recruitment SET completeStatus = 1, completeDate = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
